This application shows the last unfound caches in the country you will select from the menu. To use it, just open the app, it will load them automatically.
 - New caches will be highlighted in green. Found caches will be highlighted in red and removed automatically,
 - You can archive new caches you are not interested in by long pressing the item in the list.
 - You can open the caches with your favorite program just by clicking on them.
 - Open the menu for further features.

 Please take into account that this is just a beta phase, send me any feedback to improve the app (email: artsakenos+android@gmail.com), and of course rate ★★★★★ it if you liked. DO NOT give low rating for asking features, be polite and ask me by email. Thank you for your support.

You can choose your country or state through the application settings. At the moment the app will not run as a service, thus it could be closed by your android device. Support the development give high rating and I will add this feature. Enjoy!
